website_summaries.verdict: Another reliable model from a trusted brand for customers wanting an oversized flat bench.
pros: Extremely thick cushion for those wanting a comfortable workout
cons: A few buyers claimed they received a bench only able to hold 300 pounds rather than 600, as stated in the description

customer_reviews.title: Great bench value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. I was using the Folds XR1 adjustable bench with the preacher curl attachment, but it was a little too tall, wobbled a bit under load, and was generally bulky. This bench has none of those traits. Its small, easy to move around and rock solid stable. I am 6'1, about 220lbs and have no problems benching in my cage with it. I put self adhesive felt furniture pads under it so its vutter smooth when I mive it. Plus, it was fairly low cost comoared to other benches. I would highly recommend it unless you're a beast and need more than the 800lb weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It has a reported capacity of 600lb and seems like it could certainly handle it from my experience thus ...
customer_reviews.text: Lifted a couple times on it and it doesn't have the same issues the previous bench had (wobbling to the point of tightening every use). 275lb for several reps did not cause any issues. No idea on longevity, but I'd guess that it will probably last. The spine of the bench is one piece with 4 bolts attaching each leg and attaching the cushion. There is no padding on the feet (as one can gather from the product specs). I put some felt pads on the bottom for the wood floors and it hasn't scuffed anything yet. It has a reported capacity of 600lb and seems like it could certainly handle it from my experience thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Temporary User Name

customer_reviews.title: Terrific price, outstanding assemble product
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this product. Terrific price point, but also a great assembled product. Nice quality components, easy to assemble (with great, illustrated instructions) and solid, sturdy finished product. Every single bolt, washer, bracket and nut fit precisely in place on the assembly. The finished bench is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: DFOM

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability renders useless after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench based on the recommendation of a few garage gym review sites, who said it was a good value. Set up was easy and initially it worked well. However after approx. 6 months of moderate use, it’s developed a noticeable tilt to one side, making it dangerous for bench press. I’ll need to replace, but will go with one of the reputable equip manufacturers this time.
customer_reviews.author: Will H.

customer_reviews.title: Clearing up the weight rating
customer_reviews.text: Just to clear up the confusion, this is a 600lb rated bench, according to both the warning sticker on the bench and the owners manual. Seems very sturdy and on par with what you'd find at a local fitness establishment. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Gym Quality for half the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality made and very sturdy. I have been lifting in military gyms for over 20 years and this bench feels just like its gym grade counterparts that are $150+. Granted, I have only just received, assembled and used once but it made an impression enough to write a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Hunter Killer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bench! Easy to assemble and could tel it's going to hold 600 pounds each. Best bang for your buck as the other ones holding that weight are double or triple the cost. Only reason for 4 stars is I wish the L brackets mounting bench to the post, we're just maybe an inch or two longer under the seat area. It would help keep it from moving at all, but other then that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Bench. It is wide and long enough for most people unless you are a basketball player or Brock Lesnar. Perfect for beginners. For the price it can't be beat. They other benches cheaper than this one don't seem as reliable as this one was after I set it up. Should hold enough weight.
customer_reviews.author: BazookaTooth805

customer_reviews.title: Amaya wobble but they don't fall down
customer_reviews.text: Good looking very sturdy put it together with no problem. But it does wobble which I am very disappointed in because I wanted to bury a stable platform to bench press
customer_reviews.author: paul stone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy bench! Perfect for lifting heavy from, though I'm a long way from being able to do that. On the off chance I ever get to that point, I wanted something that could handle the weight rather than getting something cheaper and having to buy another one later on (and always wondering if the cheap one would break or not while lifting lighter weights). I trust this bench!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great bench!
customer_reviews.text: I was not looking for a super nice bench. Just something to do my at home workouts on and this fit the bill perfectly. Holds weight easily (I'm 6'2" and 315 lbs.) It feels very sturdy. My only gripe is when I lay on it, my torso is longer than the bench. I am used to that though as most benches are like that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy

customer_reviews.title: Not built for long term. Definitely not quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for my apartment and at first it worked well. After a couple months the trim began to fall off and the vinyl separated from the bottom. After a year this bench has fallen apart and I threw it away once the padding separated last week.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Solid design, big weight capacity.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it is rated for 600lbs / tested for 1000lbs is noticeable. Some cheap ones feel cheap, but not this, despite it being lightweight. I really like the wide, flat footprint of the end feet. They are stable on my carpet. Perfect height too!
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy. Plus it looks good and is about as ...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very solid and not as heavy as I expected it to be. I was on a shaky wobbly bench before this and got a power rack, so i had to get a new bench to go with it. Weighing in at 170 lbs, this bench will probably long outlive me being able to bench 430 pounds.. I'm happy. Plus it looks good and is about as comfortable as youd want it to be. The adidas logo does not have the trademark symbol, so I am not sure it is actually adidas, but that doesn't matter to me. The quality is there for a piece of chinese equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tenatra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Better than expected and it is very strong and sturdy. Perfect for garage gym. Took about 45 minutes to assemble because I’m a slow poke.
customer_reviews.author: Humphrey Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Reasonably Priced (revised: poor cushion quality)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy for basic exercises. Light and easy to carry. Best Flat Bench on Amazon probably. REVISED: its def sturdy and easy to carry. But the cushion is such poor quality. I've been using it daily for over 3 months now. The cushion is already bending and molded. Cheap quality. Sigh.....
customer_reviews.author: Mingxin

customer_reviews.title: Aint no softy
customer_reviews.text: Came with extra washers possibly for a different product?? Easy to put together. Some how it smelled nice too. very sturdy and fits me well. (6'2) could not imagine a better bench. its a bit stiff but when you got weights going on its perfect. You learn to hate soft benches quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jwamz

customer_reviews.title: Simple and strong
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bench. Simple to assemble so long as you remember not to tighten the fasteners (for each part) until all of them are inserted and tightened loosely. If you have a polished floor you are going to want to add pads to the bottom or place a thin matt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: ACAR

customer_reviews.title: Mold all over bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked the other reviews and that it looked sturdy. Received an email that said the item would be delayed, even though it was Prime. Box arrived with a small corner hole and when I opened the box and looked at the bench was covered in MOLD!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product
customer_reviews.text: The bench was very affordable during COVID-19 and it shipped quickly to my door. The bench only took 10 minutes to assemble. It is very sturdy with no movement on a level surface. It's very comfortable. I'm 5'11" and I have no issues laying on it. With my body weight and the weight of the dumbbells, it felt like I was at any gym lifting. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very good overall
customer_reviews.text: It is stable and well built. The only problem is that when I lay down on it, my head wants to hang off the end unless I scoot down to the very edge at the OTHER end (I am 6’2”) I guess you have to pay more for that. It’s not anything I can’t live with. For the money it’s hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Tipper

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it”perfectly made, high grade materials and easy assembly”
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and simple! Very easy to assemble, all parts included, nothing missing, padding is thick and firm but not plastic like, well made! This and a set of adjustable dumbells, like Bowflex and you are set. Just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: thomas pallan

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Be realistic with yourself, are you really going to need a bench to go over 600lbs? I lift just to stay fit, I’m not a power lifter and this thing does the job. You can always upgrade later if you get stronger, but you won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando V

customer_reviews.title: It is VERY stable and comfortable - on top of it it looks really COOL
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY stable and comfortable - on top of it it looks really COOL. Love adidas. Besides exercise, I use it for kitchen bench and for watching tv - there are many uses for this bench. My cat also loves it so thumb up :)
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It is a good, solid product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good, solid product. There indeed was one screw hole that was out of line, so I was only able to screw in 3 of the 4 screws to attach the legs to the top of the bench. however, since I am not a large person, it doesn't create an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Yael Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Holds my 300 lbs 6ft 6 body
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and this bench is honestly the best bang for your buck! It hold me 300 lbs and when i bench 205 lbs nothing wrong at all. Really happy with the price and quality of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy small bench
customer_reviews.text: Great and study bench. Just pay attention to dimensions, as this is an extremely small bench. Had planned to use it for some exercises it is just too low and short for. But still plenty of other applications in home gym. Quick assembly, simple directions. Everything fit properly, and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Has mold on the bench!
customer_reviews.text: The bench had mold all over it when it arrives. It stinks! It is a big and heavy box, will be a pain to throw it into trash.
customer_reviews.author: Duzgun Aral

customer_reviews.title: Key assembly parts missing
customer_reviews.text: It may be fine when the parts arrive - but the box arrived with just the seat and frame pieces - none of the bolts, nuts, washers, etc. I will be eager to see how quickly Cap Barbell responds. Update: The bench is fine. Pretty easy to put together. Amazon was terrific in responding to the lack of parts in the original order - they sent a whole new replacement. Cap Barbell, on the other hand, was horrible. Several weeks later, and the promised replacement parts have never arrived.
customer_reviews.author: blk

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong bench. Similar bench (CAP), similar price
customer_reviews.text: Should be fine for my needs. Cheap price, cheap bench, as expected. Just the wrong company. Bottom fabric a joke. Looks like cut by a 7yr old, poor job stapling.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing.
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered without any of the nuts, bolts, washers or nuts to assemble the product. After waiting three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: A little better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for my husband and he's thrilled! We haven't really put it to the test yet, but it assembles fairly easily, and served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mommazon

customer_reviews.title: Very solid bench
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bench for a few months and it has held up well. It feels very solid and looks pretty cool. I use it for ab exercises and a multitude of dumbbell lifts.
customer_reviews.author: pwrmove

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, brand name bench
customer_reviews.text: Came in exactly as described! My husband uses it daily and it was incredibly easy to assemble. I liked that the maximum weight capacity exceeded other weight benches we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Hollan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this workout bench and being able to move it around without any complications (not too heavy or bulky).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new weight bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent weight bench, very sturdy and easy to put together. If you are looking for a weight bench that you can feel comfortable and secure while lifting heavy weights; this is the bench for you. No wobbling at all and very good padding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great flat bench!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, light weight, it's a flat bench and performs as one. The padding is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Natedav

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I weight about 300lbs (136kg) and this bench dosn't move in the slightest even when I workout intensely
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bench
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bench, no issues at all with it. I've had over 500lbs on it between me and the weights and no concerns.
customer_reviews.author: IIIBobs

customer_reviews.title: very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very wobbly. Would not recommend. If it was gonna be this far off some type of leveling feet would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the material on the seat was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material on the seat was a huge disappointment. It is very thin. I would have paid more for a quality leather seat. I have hit my foot on the the two pieces jutting out underneath the legs that the legs are resting on. Be sure to wear shoes when using the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Matthew Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a startup home gym!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to a new bench today, but I must say the Adidas bench is perfect for those on a budget and proven to withstand rigorous workouts. I purchased this bench April 2017 and have been using it consistently over the last two years. At my heaviest, I weighed 255lb and was able to bench press 225-280lb, perform body weight dips, weighted step ups, decline/incline pushups, bench jumps, and weighted step overs without feeling uneasy with the stability of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: HAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bench
customer_reviews.text: High quality lightweight bench. Excellent for various exercises. Simple assembly, took maybe 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Artim

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: There is some assembling but high quality product. Thick padding, perfect for heavy person. Arrived in perfect condition, in factory box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy and I make it work for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted... a little short in the upper body area but .... I am happy and I make it work for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is as good at the benches in the gym!!!! East to put together and so sturdy. I Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MASCJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for garage gyms
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and super lightweight but not flimsy by any means. Perfect for garage gyms and at a decent price unlike these fools on the Facebook market place lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench is sturdy, firm and comfortable. It's light enough that it's easy to move around and I can't think of anything negative to say about it. I've been using it three times per week for the last month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meadors

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but not great for taller people
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench, well constructed, and nice foam density. Not a good choice for taller people. I'm 6'6" and for me this bench needs to be a full 12-14" longer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Made well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Made well and looks great! Took me around 15 minutes or so to put together, pretty simple and held me (300 lbs) and 150 lbs on my barbell quite well. I don't doubt this thing could hold well over 600 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Nice size and strength. Easy to put together and doesn't wobble. Been using this bench 3-4 times a week for a few months with good weight and I am heavy myself. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6ft 200lbs with 300+lb bench press. This bench was perfect.... sturdy, stable, and width better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer De Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bench for my at-home gym. The only thing that would make this bench perfect would be a metal plate under the pad to add long term support. But for the price it's a great sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Wobbles. Pad is sewed loose and off Center. Should have bought Amazon Basics bench for cheaper or upgraded to Rep Fitness. Used an older one of these in a gym and was good to go. Obviously they have dropped their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: RHN

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice, and worth the price. It has a tiny wobble but I can't expect it to be perfect for what i paid, so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better cover material.
customer_reviews.text: Outer cover is crap. It ripped when I put a dumbell on it between sets. Otherwise a sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.author: FuRealDoe

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a 600lb bench
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 600lb bench. I love the red accent and the Adidas logo, gives it a finished look. The bench is actually made by Cap so the quality is a known factor. Assembly was truly a breeze, though no spare part at all so don't lose anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Was not entirely level because of a bend in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not entirely level because of a bend in the frame. Didn’t appear to happen in transit as the box was undamaged. You get what you pay for though.
customer_reviews.author: TMc

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for garage gym!
customer_reviews.text: Bench seems to be decent quality. Slight wobble (less than 1/8”) when using it. Has held up to 530 with my so far.
customer_reviews.author: GarageGymJohn

customer_reviews.title: great little bench
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for home gym use - well padded and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Compact, Comfortable, Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The best for a small room. Priced decent, well built, easy to put together and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but it's not as sturdy as it could be
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but it's not as sturdy as it could be, especially for being something that needs to be relied on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid build
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Solid build. Good quality. Simple and straight forward. Cons: None!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bench
customer_reviews.text: Its doing the job, so far. No complaints. Very sturdy and doesnt take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Good bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench is high quality, easy to assemble, and reasonably priced in comparison to competition. I am really happy with this product. I haven't used it for too long yet, but it appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, delivered MUCH quicker than I was anticipating. Simple to assemble, light enough to move, sturdy enough for any entry level weigh lifting. If you're a hardcore lifter, you'll outgrow this pretty quickly, but if you're looking for something small, affordable, and sturdy to break the entry barrier into a good lifting schedule, THIS IS THE ONE.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: Solid and comfortable bench. The end caps on the legs were a little warped but they were plastic, so I bent them back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bench
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Adidas workout bench. Very sturdy n can do a number of great routines on it. Absolutely LOVE IT! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Tarango

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really a very sturdy and nice bench. Was really impressed. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BLUE COLLAR MAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. 600 lb. capacity with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: McVeyMac

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy weight bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy, and provides plenty of support for moderate exercise. Easy to assemble. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian A-Hole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I recommend it. Will update after using it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bench for starting my home gym. It is sturdy and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Foley

customer_reviews.title: like it super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: like it super sturdy, easy to put together and the foam is very stiff out of the box and maintains new appearance. comfortable for free weight workouts
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: best priced HEAVY DUTY Training Bench
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best priced HEAVY DUTY Training Bench on Amazon. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: but it is rated to 600 lbs so it is plenty sturdy enough for most lifters
customer_reviews.text: This is on the cheap end of the flat bench spectrum, but it is rated to 600 lbs so it is plenty sturdy enough for most lifters. It was easy to assemble and seems to be holding up well after a few months of use. We'll see what happens as time goes on, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and easily holds my 275lbs and weights. Very easy to assembly as well.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Now when I have guests they all say "hey man, nice bench!"
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bench. Supports 600 pounds which is exactly why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: #1Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly. Everything fit exactly where it should. The bench is extremely sturdy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The Adidas Performance Flat Bench is a great value. Easy to assemble, rock solid and rated for 600lbs. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: NeverMind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid bench - no issues and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: A. F. Morse

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy. Doesnt feel shaky at
customer_reviews.text: works well for me. I'm about 240 lbs and it supports me with the 52.5 bowflex dumbbells on it. Its sturdy. Doesnt feel shaky at all
customer_reviews.author: CoCoDeMillz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, the feedback was she loves it. I
customer_reviews.author: Charles Herrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a heavy duty bench, but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Honored1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bench, but not cushy. My husband benches quite a bit and he's had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: lari

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and easy to assemble. I replaced a cheap bench that I got at a big box store. The difference is immediately noticeable. The metal legs and frame are all one piece. No movement like on my old bench.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Elliott

customer_reviews.title: This bench is solidly built at a good price. The weight capacity is 600 lbs with ...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is solidly built at a good price. The weight capacity is 600 lbs with user, but the item information says it was tested to 1000 lbs. I probably won't be reaching that weight anytime soon, so not worried about that. The packaging was solid and the item arrived without any concerns about the condition of the item. All the screws and washers needed were safely vacuum-sealed in good packaging so there was no concern that any were missing when I opened the box. It was very easy to assemble with the tools provised (plus either an adjustable wrench or a 17mm socket).
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: solid bench, tested up to 1000 lbs and significantly cheaper than anything else I found in that category. It looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Dante R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this... sturdy, looks cool, right height. Do you even bench tho?? ;)
customer_reviews.author: CEB

customer_reviews.title: I am going back and forth between 3 and 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I am going back and forth between 3 and 4 stars. The bench is solid but it did arrive with mold on the pad.
customer_reviews.author: finkenov

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Solid bench for the price. This is a perfect addition to an economical at home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could be slightly longer, but otherwise, this has served me very well so far
customer_reviews.author: adam perres

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: ONLY RATED FOR 300LBS.
customer_reviews.text: The product page clearly states this bench supports 600lbs multiple times, as do many product reviews. The bench I received comes with a product sticker and a manual that both state 300lbs--including user. This is an absurd practice, but I already threw out the packaging so I am stuck with it. Buy at your own risk, you may end up with a "lemon" like I and others did. When you receive the product pay close attention to the manual & labeling before you open. Photo attached. I am not sure what model others are receiving but this is not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! Product arrived covered in mold! DO NOT ORDER!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler St. Denis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Flat Bench for home gym!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bench for home gym! Very impressive quality. Get your gains💪
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Pace

customer_reviews.title: Really good product, I recommend you save your money and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, I recommend you save your money and assemble it yourself, its really easy and quite fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana S.R

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench that suits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this primarily for push-ups to avoid further damage to my knees, but I've been using it for so many more exercises. Very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. Went together fast. The welds don't look very good. I think you can do better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together - supports me and the weights - 500 lbs. so far
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for such a nice bench. I use it everyday. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: drunky

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Flat Training Bench
feature_bullets: Oversized bench pad with 2.5-inch thick, high density foam
Durable construction and powder coated finish
Suggested weight limit: 300 lbs (however, passed ASTM testing to 1000 lbs)
